scripts.check: node -e "const r=n=>new Promise(o=>{require('child_process').exec(n,{stdio:'inherit'},(e,s,r)=>o({ok:!e,out:s,err:r}))});(async()=>{const t=[['typecheck','tsc --noEmit'],['test','vitest run'],['build','next build']];let p=0,f=0;console.log('\\n━━━ Running checks ━━━\\n');for(const[n,c]of t){process.stdout.write(n+'... ');const x=await r(c);x.ok?(p++,console.log('✓ pass')):(f++,console.log('✗ fail'),x.err&&console.log(x.err))}console.log('\\n━━━ Summary ━━━');console.log(p+'/'+t.length+' passed, '+f+' failed\\n');process.exit(f?1:0)})();"
